hero.title: Welcome to New Elephant
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Medical Equipment Solutions

about.title: About Us
about.description: New Elephant is a leading distributor of medical equipment and devices, dedicated to bringing world-class healthcare solutions to medical institutions and professionals. With years of expertise in the medical device industry and strong partnerships with renowned international manufacturers, we provide comprehensive support from product selection to after-sales service, ensuring the highest quality care for patients.

product1.title: Diagnostic Imaging Equipment
product1.description: Advanced diagnostic imaging systems including ultrasound, X-ray, and CT scanners from leading global manufacturers, providing accurate and reliable diagnostic capabilities.

product2.title: Surgical & Patient Monitoring Systems
product2.description: Comprehensive range of surgical instruments and patient monitoring equipment designed to enhance surgical precision and patient safety in operating rooms and critical care units.

product3.title: Laboratory & Clinical Equipment
product3.description: State-of-the-art laboratory analyzers, clinical testing equipment, and diagnostic instruments for accurate and efficient medical testing and analysis.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Contact us to learn more about our medical equipment solutions and how we can support your healthcare facility.
